1.0.name: wordpress/portal
1.0.description: At its core, Portal is a minimal blog theme, but it'll work perfectly as photography and portfolio theme. It integrates with our Page Builder plugin, so you can use it to build anything from a single landing page to a full business website. We built Portal with speed in mind. It ships with fully optimized Javascript and image spritemaps - drastically cutting load times.
